name: Udopeia
description:
In Udopeia, you are a worker at the Bureau of Public Happiness, a company that manufactures the vital drug, Moxy. In order to make Moxy, a drug that every citizen of Veracity must take, you must collect the right amount of chemicals.

When collecting chemicals, you must move the test tubes using A and D and the trash can using the left and right arrow keys. Once the two correct chemicals are collected, press W to send them down the assembly line. If the wrong chemicals are collected, the trash can can be cleared using the S key. Be sure to collect the correct chemicals, otherwise crazy things can happen!

Progress through the storyline to get to know BPH. Sometimes not everything is as it seems…

Average Playtime: ~15 minutes

Game by: Kartik Nagpal, Priyal Soni, Kara Johnson, Nathan Read

Original Sound and Music: Seth Maedo
